instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00138 charges battery only with non-Apple chargers
threads.message: I have an 820-00138-A board (15" MacBook Pro 2015) that works and charges the battery with non-Apple chargers. With an original Apple charger, I get either a flashing green light on the plug or no light at all. I replaced Q7155, the battery power MOSFET, but it didn't solve the issue.

threads.title: 820-00138 charges battery only with non-Apple chargers
threads.message:
Battery can't be charged untill you get good communication between SMC and Magsafe.
Try another DCIN board; clean its contacts.
Check continuity from U7000 to central pin of Magsafe connector.
Post U7000 voltages.

threads.title: 820-00138 charges battery only with non-Apple chargers
threads.message: Thanks for pointing me to U7000: I found some corrosion there and replaced it. All functional now.
